com.namics.oss.java.tools.utils

Class ArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.java.tools.utils.ArrayUtils

  • public class ArrayUtils
extends Object
    ArrayUtils wrapper methods for common use case of null save 1:1 copy of arrays. Overloading of several #copyOf is required for performance reasons.
    Since:
    05.02.16 08:01, 2.0
    Author:
    aschaefer, Namics AG
    See Also:
    Arrays

      • array

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> T[] array(T... input)
        easy array init with vararg, reduces need for new Type[]{} initialization.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of array items
        Parameters:
        input - vararg
        Returns:
        array from vararg

      • stream

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> Stream<T> stream(T... array)
        Returns a sequential Stream with the specified array as its source.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the array elements
        Parameters:
        array - The array, assumed to be unmodified during use
        Returns:
        a Stream for the array
        Since:
        2.0

      • copyOf

        public static <T> T[] copyOf(T[] original)
        Copies the specified array as is. so the copy has the specified length. For all indices that are valid in both the original array and the copy, the two arrays will contain identical values. The resulting array is of exactly the same class as the original array.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the class of the objects in the array
        Parameters:
        original - the array to be copied, may be null
        Returns:
        a copy of the original array, null for null original
        Since:
        2.0

      • join

        public static <T> T[] join(T[] base,
                           T... join)
        Utility to join an existing array with further items to a combined array.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of items
        Parameters:
        base - base array to join with
        join - items to join to the array
        Returns:
        joined array, new instance guaranteed
